<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"List all accessible projects"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/projects"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a paginated list of projects that the current user or API token
has access to.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"Page number for pagination","schema":{"type":"integer","default":1,"minimum":1}},{"name":"page_size","in":"query","description":"Number of items per page","schema":{"type":"integer","default":10,"minimum":1,"maximum":100}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique project identifier"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Project name"},"description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Project description"},"inserted_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Project creation timestamp"},"updated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Last update timestamp"}},"title":"Project"}},"page_number":{"type":"integer"},"page_size":{"type":"integer"},"total_entries":{"type":"integer"},"total_pages":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"ProjectListResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Authentication required","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"}}}}}},"429":{"description":"Rate limit exceeded","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"Rate limit exceeded"}}}}}}}}
>
